name: APARNET Tycoon
description:
Hello,

Congratulations on your new job as CEO of the APARNET Project.

This new technology has profound potential and we believe it could make alot of money for us.

Your job is to  gain contracts with public consumers who need our computing power, hook them up to our computers using cables and make money.

Ensure you have enough compters and cables to connect and supply all contractors.

Yours Truly,

Research Department

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Getting Started/Tutorial

  1. Top Left Button is Buy Menu
  2. Open It by clicking the button
  3. Buy a computer and cable (if you stuff up, see Step 16, cheat more money)
  4. Click back button
  5. Top Right Button is Sell Menu
  6. Open It by clicking button
  7. Accept Tutor Contract (default)
  8. Make Money
  9. Click Back
  10. Bottom Left button is Research (Feature WIP)
  11. Bottom Right button is Marketing
  12. Open It by clicking button
  13. Once you have enough money buy the first option (Top Left)
  14. This adds customers and allows you to accept more contracts
  15. Good Luck
  16. The Wrench and Screwdriver Button is the Cheat Screen
